version_description:
Dear citizens of our Great State!
Ministry of Updates is happy to announce that an update providing new capabilities is here, it includes:

- iCloud support. You can continue playing Beholder on any supported iDevice you own.
- Game size reduction. It is now 310 mb less!
- New animation added. You will see it when Carl is heading towards a targeted place of action
- Japanese translations improved heavily
- Minor bugs fixed

You now have the right to update your current build.
Yours Truely,
Your Beloved Wise Leader

Dear citizens of our Great State!
Ministry of Updates is happy to announce that update with new features is here:

- Free pack of stickers for iMessage! Enjoy Carl's emojis.
- 3D Touch support. Force Touch will open the characters interaction menu.
- Cloud saves improved. In-game pause menu now has a button for saving.
- Different minor bugs fixed

You now have the right to update your current build.
Yours Truely,
Your Beloved Wise Leader

Dear citizens!

Ministry of Updates is happy to announce the biggest update so far:
The completely new additional story "Blissful Sleep" is here! Play as the previous landlord and help him save his life and lives of the tenants. (available via in-app purchase)

In previous versions:
- 3D Touch support. Force Touch will open the characters interaction menu.
- Saves improved.

Yours Truly,
Your Beloved Wise Leader
